tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE content_usage_rights (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    permission VARCHAR(50),
    expiry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE content_assets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    asset_url TEXT,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE roles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    role_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE content_categories (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE
)
